original_text: The Lord's angel was ready to destroy Jerusalem. But the Lord decided to stop the trouble that he was causing for the people. He said to the angel who was killing the people, ‘That is enough. Stop what you are doing!’ When the Lord said that, his angel was standing near the threshing floor of Araunah the Jebusite.
korean_text: 천사가 예루살렘을 향하여 그의 손을 들어 멸하려 하더니 여호와께서 이 재앙 내리심을 뉘우치사 백성을 멸하는 천사에게 이르시되 족하다 이제는 네 손을 거두라 하시니 여호와의 사자가 여부스 사람 아라우나의 타작 마당 곁에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: The Lord's angel was ready to destroy Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 천사가 예루살렘을 멸망시키려고 준비되어 있었다.

sentences.original_text: But the Lord decided to stop the trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주님은 그 재앙을 멈추기로 결정하셨다.

sentences.original_text: that he was causing for the people.
He said to the angel who was killing the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백성을 죽이고 있던 천사에게 말했다.

sentences.original_text: his angel was standing near the threshing floor
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 천사는 타작 마당 근처에 서 있었다.
